## Two proportions model

-   $H_0:\ \pi_1 = \pi_2$
-   $H_1:\ \pi_1 \ne \pi_2$
-   $T = \frac{p_1-p_2}{se}
    -   $se=\sqrt()
-   Accept $H_0$ if T is close to zero.
    -   $if z(\alpha/2) < T < z(1-\alpha/2)$
